title: Evolution of the U.S. Air Force Instructional Design Model: Systematic Mathematics Lesson Design Application

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Cultivating systematic problem-solving skills by integrating military instructional design principles into mathematics education

learning_goals: Learners can establish mathematics problem-solving strategies by applying the three-stage instructional design process (analysis-design-development)
Learners can decompose complex mathematical problems into step-by-step components using a systematic approach developed from military training.
Learners can revise and supplement self-directed learning plans based on formative assessment feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
